backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types (Laborer, Booking, Service, Availability) and implementing laborer profile management, booking creation/retrieval, and access control with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three debugging and investigation tasks related to fixing outgoing booking display issues in BookingsDashboard.tsx, including logging, timing, and cache synchronization.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, key features, and implementation details including routing, queries, UI components, and booking management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining warm earth-tone palette (amber, orange, stone) for light and dark modes with CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all route definitions, Layout wrapper with profile setup modal for new users, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/BookingHistorySe: Collapsible section component displaying completed and cancelled bookings with status badges, formatted dates, and clickable cards linking to booking detail pages.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header navigation, authentication controls, and responsive mobile menu. Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and displays navigation links for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name during initial profile setup. Uses a form with validation and calls the save profile mutation on submit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingFilters.ts: Utility hook providing a function to filter bookings by status and sort them by date (newest or oldest). Returns filtered and sorted booking arrays.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication. Manages login state, identity persistence, and provides login/logout functions with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend data operations including user profiles, laborer profiles, bookings, and booking status updates. Each hook uses the actor from useActor and manages query/mutation state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming including light and dark mode color schemes. Defines design tokens for colors, borders, and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/BookingDetailPage.tsx: Detailed view page for a single booking showing requester/provider information, booking details, status, and contact information. Allows editing booking details and displays user profiles with mobile numbers.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsDashboard.tsx: Manages and displays incoming and outgoing bookings with filtering, sorting, and status update capabilities. Includes extensive debug logging for tracking booking classification and state.
frontend/src/pages/BookingSuccessPage.ts: Displays a success confirmation page after a booking request is submitted, with options to find more laborers or view bookings dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CreateBookingPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new booking request for a specific laborer, with validation and detailed logging of form submission and laborer data loading.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Search and browse page for finding laborers by location, displaying their availability, skills, services, and contact information with booking navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing homepage with hero section, feature highlights, and call-to-action buttons for authentication and navigation to main app features.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page for laborers to edit their information including name, skills, services, location, contact details, mobile number, and availability status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata for a peer-to-peer labor booking marketplace app, documenting existing features, known issues (booking service not working, outgoing bookings not appearing), and architectural notes about laborer identification and core functionality.
